skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.Enable
skill.description:
For an agent to know how to disable a set of systems. Systems are visited in the order of the list.
Enable/disable skills may be used to model the damage/sabotage of a resource node.

parameter.name: systems
parameter.description: A list of systems to enable.

link.name: reach
link.description: To go to a specified system.

link.name: enable
link.description: To enact the decision to disable a specified system.

feedback.name: enabled
feedback.description: Executed upon completion of the related action.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all 'systems' have been visited, even of once of them has not been enabled.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of 'systems' is empty (no element to act on).
